name: DailyZone
description:
DailyZone is a daily meditation app with an AI-backed sound engine for personalised meditation experience.

It is developed to create unique meditative sessions.

team.name: Ceren Ince
team.bioHtml: Digital Intelligence analyst with experience of business insight and data analytics. Involved in product testing, management and development of growth strategy

jobs.title: SwiftUI Developer (Remote / 25 hours per week)
jobs.description:
DailyZone is a RnD startup that develops a generative audio engine for meditation. 

We are currently looking for a junior/mid level front-end developer to polish the application and ship its client facing side to the users. The application is written Swift and the UI is written in SwiftUI so some experience on that end would be preferable 

It's a 25 hours per week contract and a fully remote position. 

Drop us a message if you'd like to talk more about it

DailyZone is a RnD startup that develops a generative audio engine for meditation.

We are currently looking for a junior/mid level front-end developer to polish the application and ship its client facing side to the users. The application is written Swift and the UI is written in SwiftUI so some experience on that end would be preferable
